duties_responsibilities.duty: Own and manage Universal Studios Hollywood's fixed asset sub-system and processes.
Execute all fixed asset acquisition, maintenance, and disposal activities in the SAP fixed asset sub-ledger.
Supervise and manage Sr Analyst, FA.
Analyze large-scale project costs and create new asset structures with proper categorization into asset classes.
Prepare support for audit and tax-related questions, projects, and reports.
Assist with the execution of periodic physical inventories.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Finance, Accounting, or related field (Master’s preferred)
